title: PermissionEX 中给指定世界的指令没有用！？
author: Liping
txt_content:
最近刚上手PERMISSIONEX的阶层管理插件。目前世界之间通用的指令都能完好执行，唯一是当我想要给一个指定世界特殊指令时就没有用。以下是我已经修改过的PermissionEX的指令
groups:
  Default:
    default: true
    prefix: '&e[Guest]&w'
    suffix: ''
    permissions:
    - modifyworld.chat
    - essentials.help
    - essentials.list
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.rules
    - essentials.spawn
    - commandbook.warp.teleport
    worlds:
      flat:
        - modifyworld.chat
        - modifyworld.*
      world:
        - modifyworld.chat
        - -modifyworld.*
      City of Dragon Fest:
        - modifyworld.chat
        - -modifyworld.*
    options:
      rank: '1000'
      build: false
  Builder:
    default: false
    prefix: '&2[Builder]&w'
    suffix: ''
    permissions:
    - modifyworld.*
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.kit.tools
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    worlds:
      flat:
        - modifyworld.chat
        - modifyworld.*
      world:
        - modifyworld.chat
        - modifyworld.*
      City of Dragon Fest:
        - modifyworld.chat
        - modifyworld.*
    inheritance:
    - Default
    options:
      rank: '900'
      build: true
  Architect:
    default: false
    prefix: '&2[Achitect]'
    suffix: ''
    permissions:
    - modifyworld.*
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.kit.tools
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - worldedit.*
    inheritance:
    - Default
    options:
      rank: '800'
      build: true
  Moderator:
    default: false
    prefix: '&5[Mod]'
    suffix: ''
    permissions:
    - modifyworld.*
    - essentials.ban
    - essentials.ban.notify
    - essentials.banip
    - essentials.broadcast
    - essentials.clearinventory
    - essentials.delwarp
    - essentials.ext
    - essentials.getpos
    - essentials.helpop.recieve
    - essentials.home.others
    - essentials.kick
    - essentials.kick.notify
    - essentials.kill
    - essentials.mute
    - essentials.setwarp
    - essentials.tp
    - essentials.tphere
    - essentials.tppos
    - essentials.tptoggle
    - essentials.unban
    - essentials.unbanip
    - essentials.weather
    - essentials.whois
    - essentials.world
    - worldedit.*
    inheritance:
    - Builder
    options:
      rank: '700'
      build: true
  Admin:
    default: false
    prefix: '&c[Admin]'
    suffix: ''
    permissions:
    - -essentials.backup
    - -essentials.essentials
    - -essentials.setspawn
    - -essentials.reloadall
    - -essentials.plugin
    - essentials.*
    - worldedit.*
    inheritance:
    - Moderator
    options:
      rank: '600'
      build: true
  Owner:
    default: false
    prefix: '&4[Owner]'
    suffix: ''
    permissions:
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - Admin
    options:
      rank: '1'
      build: true

replies.author: 丶欧尼酱
replies.txt_content: 请问楼主,,你那个 禁止玩家在世界破坏会么??如果会教下我...我
